item.title: Tree Sitter Grammar Testing
item.description: There are many parser generator tools - but Tree Sitter supports a nice test driven development style. The main reason to consider Tree Sitter over existing tools is the support for fast, incremental parsing - to allow for example parsing a document on each key stroke. A perhaps less common reason is to have a machine-readable language grammar that can be used for differential testing of the language parsing of a hand written translator parser versus the specfication of the language.

item.title: Raytrace
item.description:
The raytracer challenge book provides a test driven, easy to to get started with, from scratch, step by step project to build yourself a raytracer to create pretty pictures.

Turns out a raytracer makes for a nice benchmark and testcase for language implementations, too.
